definition: broken/damaged/worn out/lousy/rotten/to break, split or cleave/to get rid of/to destroy/to break with/to defeat/to capture (a city etc)/to expose the truth of

thin piece/flake/a slice/film/TV play/to slice/to carve thin/partial/incomplete/one-sided/classifier for slices, tablets, tract of land, area of water/classifier for CDs, movies, DVDs etc/used with numeral 一[yi1]: classifier for scenario, scene, feeling, atmosphere, sound etc/Kangxi radical 91

sentences.english: Bulletproof helmets are widely used to prevent bullets and fragments.
sentences.chinese: 防弹头盔通常用以防子弹或破片。

sentences.english: Results The penetration quality of SFF group formed from cuneiform liner is powerful.
sentences.chinese: 结果由楔形罩形成的扇形自锻破片束侵彻性强。

sentences.english: Meanwhile, the rigid material model is suitable for the premade fragment.
sentences.chinese: 程序中对预制破片采用刚性材料模型是合理可行的。

sentences.english: The fragment impact initiation of the charge covered with a thin plate was researched.
sentences.chinese: 研究破片对薄盖板装药的冲击起爆问题。

sentences.english: The regularity of fragments dispersion of the warhead under asymmetrical multi spots initiation is studied.
sentences.chinese: 研究战斗部偏心多点起爆条件下破片径向飞散规律。

sentences.english: Distributive characters of hypervelocity fragments impacting double-level target were researched.
sentences.chinese: 研究了超高速破片碰撞双层靶形成碎片云的分布特点。

sentences.english: He stuck the broken pieces together.
Then crystal scraps of all these rising in the dazzling beams added to their sum.
sentences.chinese: 于是一切耀眼光中上升的破片都汇成一统。

sentences.english: Objective To explore the effects of high velocity fragment on the severity of blast injuries.
sentences.chinese: 目的探讨犬高速破片伤对冲击伤伤情的影响。

sentences.english: She dropped the vase and it broke into pieces.
sentences.chinese: 她一失手，花瓶掉下碎成破片了。
